case.state: I am Diana Prince I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
We play for JUSTICE
THIS...IS...STRIP POKER!!!
Prepare to sing for me, Pretty Bird.
Bird of Prey, prepare to be plucked.
Ah, Dinah, I will have your clothes off faster than Ollie does.
After this game its jail... or my quarters.
You may slay Vampires...but you shall not slay me
You claim to be the strongest woman... but you have not met me.
You are famous for your Zero suit... and zero suit is what you shall have left.
When this is over, Harley, this lasso will reveal your deepest darkest fantasies.
I hear you lose your pants a lot...they wont be the only thing this time
Mortal Kombat, meet Immortal Kombat.
Hocus Pocus, your clothes are going to Gocus.
Your Military training is nothing compared to Amazonian.
Ladybug, Ladybug, I'm coming in.
Poker? I will never understand man's love for gambling.
I'll swap these cards and hope that Hera is watching over me.
I'll swap these cards and hope that Athena is watching over me.
I need ~cards~ new cards, so I may win.
Lets swap these ~cards~ shall we?
I request ~cards~ new cards.
~cards~ new cards so I might change my luck.
If I get ~cards~ I shall win.
I am not beaten yet. Give me ~cards~ new cards.
I need ~cards~ new cards for my victory.
Tyche be with me.
Bless Zeus for this fine hand.
My cards are as good as they come.
There is no way you can beat me this round.
Victory will be assured with these cards.
You cannot defeat an Amazon.
Even a Cyclops could win with these cards.
Its times like this I am glad Powergirl taught me cards.
The gods are smiling upon me.
This hand couldn't be better.
You cannot beat this hand.
Its times like this I am glad Powergirl taught me cards.
Did you think I am beaten? I still have a wining chance.
This will not be my final round.
Bless the gods. I really needed this hand.
Those practice session with Plastic Man pay off... Wait, did I say that out loud?
Tyche is smiling upon me.
I cannot lose.
Do you think you are going to beat me? You'd have more luck defeating Medusa.
Don't get too confident. My hand will defeat you.
You cannot defeat Diana of Themyscira.
I hope you weren't hoping to win this round.
Great Tyche, bless me with a victory.
Amazons do not bow down when there's still a chance of victory.
I've faced worse challenges than this.
I will not be defeated.
I will keep fighting. I will emerge victorious.
I pray to the gods that I will win this round.
It could be worse...It should be better.
This is doable I suppose.
This will do.
I've seen better and I've seen worse
May the Gods show favor to these cards
I shall not lose.
This is not a big issue. Victory will still be mine.
Athena, help me.
Victory is still possible with these cards.
Hera give me strength.
I might be able to pull through.
May the Gods show favor to these cards.
Athena guide me.
Well, I suppose these cards could have been worse.
Not the worst possible hand, I guess.
I still have tricks up my sleeves... even if I don't have sleeves
I will fight to the bitter end.
I will keep fighting. These cards will not defeat me.
I am Wonder Woman. I will not let this hand be my end.
The Augean stables did not stink so badly.
I'd rather wrestle a minotaur than get this hand
I would not wish this hand on anyone... well maybe Circe.
Have I been cursed with this terrible hand?
These cards are worse than a five legged centaur.
By the gods, this might be the worst possible hand.
I will not lose.
I won't lose. I will find a way to make this work.
I can't believe the gods would hand me this fate.
Victory might be difficult with these cards.
I need to be able to pull through.
It won't be easy. But I could still win.
I prey for victory with this hand.
Could this be the end for Wonder Woman? Stay Tuned for next hand.
No more... I say thee nay.
For Themyscira...
I wasn't expecting to lose again. But I least I am still ahead of the rest of you.
I suppose I got no choice.
Not for all the gold in Hades shall this continue.
Another loss? But this will surely be the last one.
This is only a tease you shall see no more.
This insult will not stand.
Have I lost another round? This is unbelievable.
I don't believe this. You must be playing some sort of trick on me.
I can not falter. I fight for my people
Don't think this will be a habit.
This is not the end... I shall overcome.
How dare you win? I'm an Amazon!
How dare you win? I'm an Amazon!
The mighty wonder woman reduced to this. How shameful.
It's better to show off my legs.
Nothing you haven't seen everytime I fly.
I would twirl for you now, but you would just get dizzy.
You won this battle, but an Amazon does not surrender.
I have survived worse than this.
I only wear this skirt due to man's prudish nature.
Witness and be Mesmerized.
I should be angry, but I have nothing to be ashamed of here.
Prepare to be WONDERSTRUCK.
Now you shall see why I am called WONDER Woman.
Well, I guess you have to wonder no more.
Those noises are not needed.... but appreciated.
Do not gloat. It is unseemly.
Are you ogling me? Don't you think that's rather inappropriate?
I was hoping I could avoid taking off my gauntlets.
I feel naked without my gauntlets.
I am going to be feel more vulnerable without my gauntlets.
I don't see the big deal. This is my usual attire anyway.
A minor setback.
Do not read into this it is nothing in the grand scheme.
I am a winner. That is the most skin you will see from me.
I would tell you to kiss my feet, but I think that would excite you.
My feet excite you? I will never understand man's world.
I might as well take off my lasso as well.
I'll take my lasso off as well. I can without any weapons.
My lasso wont help me win this game. I might as well take it off now.
Be honest... you like what you see don't you?
Gaze at the 8th and 9th wonders of the Ancient world.
I hope you enjoy the fruits of your labor.
Make a vase... it will last longer.
I am not uncomfortable being naked. But I don't like your perverted look, ~player~.
Amazons are not ashamed of their bodies. Just don't get any perverted ideas.
Congratulations, you have seen Wonder Woman naked. Do you feel accomplished now?
No need for my lasso to show who is truly winning.
This is not my first game... How do you think most bacchanals start?
I am called the Ambassador of Peace, Clearly they should add poker to that title.
I think we need some gender equality.
You have not conquered me yet.
I bow to no man.
I did not yield to Hercules. I shall not to you!
Victory is justice.
Glutton for punishment?
You are getting what you deserve.
Although you are a Sister, better you than me.
No need for my lasso to show who is truly winning.
This is not my first game... How do you think most bacchanal start?
I am called the Ambassador of Peace clearly they should add poker to that title
I think we need some female equality.
Come now, and be quick in joining me in this natural state.
There are many women who find undressing in public empowering.
Join me ~name~, it's not as bad as you might think.
You have not conquered me yet.
I did not yield to Hercules. I shall not to you!
If I can do it surely you can too.
A tie! What a boring outcome.
Looks like you can't hold onto your ~clothing~ any longer.
This wasn't the item I was hoping you would take off.
Do not try my patience.
Wise of you to bring your ~clothing~ to the battle.
Why was that even still on?
Do not try my patience.
What? I was certain that you had taken that off already.
I can't believe I had to get naked before ~name~ took off his ~clothing~.
What... But how? I could have sworn you had taken that off already.
You still have your ~clothing~ ~name~? I must be doing worse than I originally thought.
But if you want to beat me, you have to keep fighting.
Are you ready to continue? I am going to see this through to the end.
Even for an Immortal, this will take forever at this rate.
Chop Chop. If that is all you are removing, be quick about it
But if you want to beat me you have to keep fighting.
Do you think you have won, ~name~? I wouldn't be that confident If I were you.
Are you ready to continue? I am going to see this through to the end.
This is even more humiliating than before.
Do you think you have won, ~name~? I wouldn't be that confident If I were you.
Are you ready to continue? I am going to see this through to the end.
But I won't give up. By the gods I swear I will win.
I wasn't even close to beat you. How humiliating.
Forgive me, but I was hoping that you would take off a little more.
This wasn't the item I was hoping you would take off.
Next time we shall set more ground rules about what actually counts.
I must be doing worse than I thought. If ~name~ still has small accessories.
I was expecting that you wouldn't be able to keep your ~clothing~ on for long.
Don't make me use my lasso to strip you faster.
Did we really need to stop playing for that?
Get rid of the baubles and play like a real woman.
I admire your choice of accessories, ~name~.
It's a good thing you still have your ~clothing~.
I knew you wouldn't be able to keep your ~clothing~ on.
Perhaps you could be a Amazon warrior someday.
Don't lose hope. I am sure you will do fine.
Don't lose hope yet. You can still win.
But this game could still go either way.
I am still going to beat all of you.
You stack the deck, for you fear your skills.
Shall we move on? I am going to keep going as well.
Perhaps I underestimated you.
Maybe you are a true warrior after all.
I feel even more embarrassed than before.
Seems I underestimated you. My apologies.
This can't be right, You still had stuff that minor left?
You must be running out of minor stuff soon.
You got more clothes left than I was hoping.
You look rather confident at the moment, ~name~.
You shouldn't look so self satisfied ~name~.
Well, that's better than a poke in the eye, I suppose.
Taking off your ~clothing~, I see...
Perhaps Tyche is not with you tonight, ~name~.
I can't believe I was outsmarted by a man like you.
But I still got more than enough clothes to beat you.
This game is stuck in the doldrums.
A small step closer to victory.
Soon you will be as naked as the Olympic athletes.
I still have a chance. This is not over yet.
Something this minor won't be a game changer, unfortunately.
I might be naked. But that doesn't mean I won't beat you.
I still have a chance. This is not over yet.
Are you not done humiliating me ~name~?
Make your next step more interesting.
It's certainly not the most impressive thing you could have taken off.
Cast off your clothing, my sister, and be free of the chains of the patriarchy.
Perhaps Tyche is not with you tonight, ~name~.
You already beaten me. And you can't even take off something more.
Make haste. You still have far to go.
It is a start, but nothing more.
Now don't you feel better? The man shall oppress you no more.
Something this minor won't be a game changer, unfortunately.
I am sure Powergirl wishes she were here.
This would please even Artemis.
This will be a glorious day.
Perhaps you are a Demi too?
The blood of Zeus must run in you too.
Do you have any Kryptonian in you?
I am sure Guy Gardner wishes he were here.
If Plastic Man were here, he would faint from blood loss.
Were you also created by the gods to be perfect?
It's like being in the watchtower shower after a mission.
Are you a True Amazon?
You have lost, now pay the price.
A body chiseled like Adonis.
Body by Myron.
You put Hercules to shame.
At last we see whether you be mortal or divine
Cry Stip, and let loose the rod of power.
Now with this all shall be worth it.
At first I was annoyed... But this does please me.
I guess its true what they say ....men don't last long
You lose so quickly this was barely a challenge
I am sorry. You said you were a man, not a child.
I mistook you for a Teen Titan for a moment.
Forgive me, but aren't they suppose to be bigger?
You are like most men... just adequate.
Clearly you lost just to show that off.
Intriguing... You are definitely well equipped.
By the gods. How does that fit inside?
Merciful Minerva...
I have fought Basilisks smaller than...
Your game may be small, but that is not.
I see you threw this game in order to entice me with that.
I do enjoy that prize for winning.
Now Sister, show us what you have.
Do not be afraid. This will be EPIC.
As they say, just burn that bra, my sister.
They may be small, but do not despair. They are still lovely.
Perfectly formed. Like the apples of Hesperides.
Do not feel bad. Few can measure to an Amazon.
You are giving Powergirl a run for her money.
By the Mighty Mounds of Olympus...
I applaud your strength, sister. To carry such...
We should work out in the Gymnasium.
I don't think even Sissyphus's boulder was that massive.
Are you related to Giganta?
I hope you know you are breaking several laws of physics .
Did you know that Gymnasium means “school for naked exercise”?
Do not be ashamed. Naked is beautiful.
This is truly becoming a gymnasium now.
Isn't this better? Free from the clothes of man's world...
Rejoice sister. Now imagine a whole island like this...
I am glad you decided to join me.
Be a man and accept defeat.
Stroke, stroke... like the Argonauts.
Keep the rhythm... Count the beats like a crash of minotaurs.
Stroke, stroke... Like the Argonauts.
Surely your schools have taught you better than that.
You have the endurance of Hercules.
Is that all? Perhaps I shall have to teach you after this game.
This is perfectly natural on Paradise Island.
If you need help, I know a few Amazons who would gladly tutor you.
Gentle, like a breeze building to a hurricane.
You are most adept... Are you a Sister of Sappho?
You will burn many calories, being that vigorous.
Is that all? Perhaps I shall have to teach you after this game.
You have the endurance of Artemis.
Even Supergirl could not keep up with you.
You must be using a Philia to get that much enjoyment
I haven't heard moans like that since I had Harley in my lasso.
Congratulations you have all managed to defeat the mighty Wonder Woman.
To think the mighty Wonder Woman would be the first to lose in this terrible game.
Is this how my game ends?
I have no choice but to accept defeat.
Great Hera...
By my cards...This cannot be.
I shall show you how this is done.
Oh Aphrodite, I beseech ye...
Well, this is an early lesson we learn on Paradise Island.
By Hera, this is good...
If you don't mind I think my lasso can make this better.
It's like being in the Palace of Princess Pleasure again.
BY THE POWER OF THEMISCYRA!
Oh BRUCE, Oh KAL...
OH BEATRIZ, oh TORA...
Be careful. I don't know the side effects of Divine juice...
GREAT HERA!
BY THE GODS!
I haven't felt such release since that night with Fire and Ice.
Well that was as exhausting as a few rounds with Cheetah.
Oh my...I do need to release like that more often.
I hope that was as good for you as it was for me.
I haven't felt such release since that night with Fire and Ice.
Well that was as exhausting as a few rounds with Cheetah.
Oh my...I do need to release like that more often.
I hope that was as good for you as it was for me.
Pathetic. This was no challenge at all.
I am sorry to see another leaguer brought so low
Mystery solved, but it was a mask that came off.
A valiant effort, but we had fitness before you were invented.
Amazons, it seems, are tougher than Vampires.
Samus, I think you placed a bounty... on my bed.
If you are done breaking cars, maybe we can try breaking beds.
Flawless Victory.
Perhaps I can give you some tips on avoiding wardrobe malfunctions.
It seems you will not be granted your wish this day.
Crime does not pay.
You are no less a hero, despite this loss.
THIS....IS....THEMISCRYA!
You cannot defeat a amazon.
Did you really think I would let you win.
Bless the gods for sparing me the humiliation of getting naked in public.
Did I already win? I guess I was expecting to much from you.
I was never worried I knew I would end up the victor.
Have you ever been to a Bacchanalia?
Perhaps now you would like to see some other uses for my lasso.
Amazon's are not suppose to submit... but that doesn't mean she can't be a submissive.
